桘字的基本解释

桘
chuí
古同“槌”。

桘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuí］
［《廣韻》直追切，平脂，澄。］
亦作“桘1”。
(1)同“椎1”。捶击的器具。
(2)捶打；敲击。
[②]［zhuì］
［《廣韻》馳僞切，去寘，澄。］
亦作“桘2”。
架蚕箔的木柱。
[③]［duī］
［《字彙》都回切］
亦作“桘3”。
(1)投掷，掷击。
(2)同“”。饼。参见“槌3餅”。

桘字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　桘； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页526第12
【廣韻】與槌同。

桘字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
桘字的起名意思

暂无。

桘
Basic explanation of words
桘
chuí
Gu Tong "Maul".
桘
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chuí］
["Guangyun" is straight after cutting, flat fat, clear. ]
Also known as "桘1".
(1) Same as "Zi 1". A thumping implement.
(2) Beat; percussion.
[②]［zhuì］
["Guangyun" cuts falsely, sets and clears. ]
Also known as "桘2".
Wooden pillars of silkworm foil.
[③] [duī]
["Words" all cut back]
Also known as "桘3".
(1) Throwing, throwing and hitting.
(2) Same as "". cake. See "Matt 3 loaves".
桘
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　桘; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 526-12
【Guangyun】Same as the mallet.
